urls.title: Ethiopian App
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. urls.title: Flight to Chennai
urls.description: Beginning July 2, 2022, Ethiopian Airlines, the aviation group in Africa, will start operating three times a week to Chennai, India. Chennai will be the four...

data.text:
Beginning July 2, 2022, Ethiopian Airlines, the aviation group in Africa, will start operating three times a week to Chennai, India. Chennai will be the fourth destination in India after New Delhi, Mumbai, & Bengaluru, on the widespread Ethiopian network.
https://t.co/waCwEZDvd1

Ethiopian Airlines strives to give you a unique travel experience in total comfort!  
We are waiting for you on board!  #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/jpfHru4mPB

Wishing you all a great week, filled with smiles! 
  #EthiopianAirFanpage   #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/9U4n6EOK9w

Landing at a beautiful weekend!
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/N6CvM1Aeq7

Ethiopian MRO, the largest & fully certified maintenance hub in Africa, offers world-class services to its customers with its fully equipped Hangars, Engine and Component Maintenance workshops.
 #EthiopianAirlines #EthiopianMRO https://t.co/CuRw8gBWat

urls.title: Welcome to Ethiopian Airlines Official Website

data.text:
We've learned that false messages with scamming link are circulating on social media claiming that Ethiopian Airlines is offering gifts regarding its 75th anniversary. Please be cautious of such scams. Here's our official website link: 
https://t.co/WgauWcZUZE 
#EthiopianAirlines https://t.co/k2H6Ilaorv

We are honoured to welcome His Excellency President Wavel Ramkalawan, President of the Republic of Seychelles and First Lady Her Excellency Mrs Linda Ramkalawan on board our flight. 
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/3W627iTRDV

Following the reopening of Northern Runway after rehabilitation, Ethiopian Airlines is pleased to inform you that all its three daily flights will operate from Dubai International Airport (DXB), Terminal1.   #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/lhO62SMSL1

data.text: Veteran Captain Mekonnen Beri, who led the historic flight of Emperor Haile Selassie’s visit to Jamaica back in 1966, was also the Author of the book entitled "Aviation in Ethiopia",which is the first of its kind in the history of Ethiopian aviation.#Ethiopian #ThrowbackThursday https://t.co/s2CtC6RWXg

Ethiopian Airlines celebrated its 10th year anniversary of flight commencement to Cotonou, Benin. Currently, Ethiopian is serving Cotonou with Four times a week flight frequency.

urls.title: ShebaMiles| Buy, Gift, Transfer Miles
urls.description: Short of miles for your next award? You can buy the miles that you need to get closer to your next award. You can also gift or transfer miles to your friends and family.

data.text:
Don’t miss your chance to rack up the miles! Until June 11, 2022, get 60% bonus miles when you buy miles and take off on your next trip even sooner! You can also give the gift of miles to your loved ones, and they will be rewarded with this exciting bonus.
https://t.co/Te4Tergpd2 https://t.co/ajUs6xNkrY

annotations.normalized_text: Air Cargo Industry Customer Care Award

data.text:
10 days left! Vote Now, Vote for Us !
Ethiopian Airlines has been nominated in two categories for the World Air Cargo Awards 2022-
“Cargo airline of the year” and “Air Cargo Industry Customer Care Award”.
Please click here to vote: https://t.co/Nn0EdMqXSE https://t.co/sRwPlPRfFk

urls.title: Ethiopian App
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. You can now make your booking to more than 110 Ethiopian destination and mark your journey with the latest fleet using Ethiopian App by following simple steps. Experience premium app. You can now search and make your booking to more than 110 Ethiopian destinations and mark your journey with the latest fle ets using Ethiopian mobile App. Book your flight using your device and enjoy with us.

data.text:
We are pleased to announce thrice-weekly flights to Chennai “ The city of temples” India effective 02 July 2022. 
Book your flight now with Ethiopian Mobile APP.
#EthiopianAirlines
#FlyEthopian
https://t.co/r8XxeylEH7 https://t.co/GRbjm8FG1y
Sit back, relax and enjoy an unforgettable moment. #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/akzHv6e9J1

Happy Ethiopian Patriot's Day!
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/ZVL6Xbgq88

The window seat always offers unique view! 
Please send us your travel moments & we will share it back to you!
#ETMoments #Windowviewwednesday
📸 @ lucieory https://t.co/O7lmqokIGI

Traveling is always a good reason to smile.
Explore and experience Ethiopian.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/kE4OoMhLzT

Ethiopian Airlines wishes a happy holiday to all Muslims. Eid Mubarak!
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/4E2qB2jRfR
